snippet: N.F.L. rules say a team needs to hold a season-ending news conference within a week after its final game. The Jets won’t make that deadline.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets will hold their season-ending news conference nine days after the end of their season, violation of league's media policy, which requires every team to conduct a news conference during the week after the season; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. rules say a team needs to hold a season-ending news conference within a week after its final game. The Jets won’t make that deadline.

headline.seo: Jets to Hold Season-Ending News Conference a Little Late
headline.main: No Words, but Drama Continues for Jets
headline.print_headline: No Words, But Drama Continues For Jets
